title: revoke_credentials
description: Revoke (clear) API credentials from the current MCP session without closing the connection. After revocation, account and trading tools will return CREDENTIALS_NOT_CONFIGURED error until credentials are reconfigured. This tool requires no parameters.
notes: Always succeeds (idempotent - revoking non-existent credentials is no-op)
Session remains active after revocation (connection not closed)
In-flight authenticated requests may complete with old credentials (non-blocking)
Subsequent authenticated tool calls return CREDENTIALS_NOT_CONFIGURED error
User can reconfigure credentials via configure_credentials after revocation
Credentials are also automatically cleared when session ends (connection closes)
use_cases: Testing credential configuration flow without reconnecting
Switching between testnet/mainnet by revoking then reconfiguring
